I do not have enough kind words to share about Dr. Anupama Rani. I am not exaggerating when I say she is so knowledgaeble, kind, compassionate, patient all at the same time! She takes the time to address all concerns and questions, no matter how big or small they may seem. No rushed consultations. Every consultation, my husband and I walked out with so much clarity & content. Being an unplanned pregnancy and having conceived amidst multiple treks & off-roading, we had a lot of questions starting from day 1, and she did not shy away from debunking all myths and explaining things backed with reasons. She even draws on a paper to help us picturise and understand how it all works. And if at all we missed to ask something during consultation, she was available on whatsapp throughout. I had a normal vaginal delivery a month back, and trust me when I say she was like a solid pillar & strength helping me through the whole labour. I got admitted at 11am and got out with my little bundle of joy at 4pm. First thing I did the next day when she came to check on me was to give her a tight hug. Wouldn't have been possible without her.

She is such a blessing. If you are expecting a baby and looking for a no-nonsense OB-GYN, go meet Dr. Anupama Rani. Will be your best decision, as was mine.
